00043 using namespace std;
00044 
00045 class GenderTest : public RegressionSuite 
00046 {
00047 public:
00048     int numPassed;
00049     int numFailed;
00050     std::string testDir;
00051   
00052     GenderTest()
00053     {
00054         numPassed = 0;
00055         numFailed = 0;
00056     }
00057     void genderTest1();
00058 };
00059 
00060 void GenderTest::genderTest1()
00061 { 
00062         string outdir = Fs::join(testDir, "genderTest1");
00063         Fs::rmdirPath(outdir, false);
00064         Fs::mkdir(outdir, false);
00065         vector<RegressionCheck *> checks;
00066       
00067         string name = "genderTest1";
00068                 
00069         string command = "./apt-copynumber-gender"
00070                          " --out-dir " + testDir + "/genderTest1"
00071                          " --xml-file-append-only  ./../../../regression-data/data/lib/gender/genderTest1/genderxml.txt " ;
00072         
00073         checks.push_back(new MatrixCheck(       testDir + "/genderTest1/genderCalls.txt",
00074                                                 "../../../regression-data/data/copynumber/gender/genderTest1/genderCalls.txt",
00075                                                  0.0000001,
00076                                                  1, 2, false, 0));
00077  
00078 
00079         RegressionTest genderTest1(name.c_str(), command.c_str(), checks);
00080         genderTest1.setSuite(*this,  outdir, outdir + "/GenderTest.log", outdir + "/valgrind.log");
00081         Verbose::out(1, "Doing " + name + "()");
00082         if(!genderTest1.pass()) 
00083         {
00084             Verbose::out(1, "Error in genderTest1::" + name + "(): " + genderTest1.getErrorMsg());
00085             numFailed++;
00086         }
00087         else 
00088         {
00089             numPassed++;
00090         }
00091 } 
00092 
00093 
00094 int main(int argc, char* argv[]) {
00095     try {
00096         /* Set up the logging and message handlers. */
00097         FsTestDir testDir;
00098         testDir.setTestDir("copynumber/copynumber-gender", true);
00099       
00100 
00101         ofstream logOut;
00102         string logName;
00103         logName = Fs::join(testDir.asString(), "test-regression-copynumber-gender-run.log");
00104         Verbose::out(1, "Log file: " + logName);
00105         Fs::mustOpenToWrite(logOut, logName.c_str());
00106         LogStream log(3, &logOut);
00107 
00108         Verbose::pushMsgHandler(&log);
00109         Verbose::pushProgressHandler(&log);
00110         Verbose::pushWarnHandler(&log);
00111 
00112         Verbose::setLevel(3);
00113         GenderTest test;
00114         test.testDir = testDir.asString();
00115         test.parseArgv(argv);
00116         test.doValgrind();
00117         string database = test.getDatabase();
00118 
00119         Verbose::out(1, "Execute regression test: GenderTest");
00120 
00121                 test.genderTest1();
00122 
00123         Verbose::out(1, "NumPassed: " + ToStr(test.numPassed) + " NumFailed: " + ToStr(test.numFailed) + " for test-regression-copynumber-gender");
00124         logOut.close();
00125         return test.numFailed != 0;
00126     }
00127     catch(...) {
00128         Verbose::out(1,"Unexpected Error: uncaught exception.");
00129         return 1;
00130     }
00131     return 1;
00132 }
